title: Ticket #7334: HTCondor shadow links in auth libraries on Debian/Ubuntu
description: Investigate why the condor_shadow on Debian/Ubuntu have the auth libraries linked in rather that dlopen()ing them as needed.
remarks:
2020-Apr-10 07:42:27 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080808 to v080809 using ticket-target-mover.

2020-Oct-09 16:44:19 by tim:
This change is fairly extensive and does not belong in the stable series.

This has been changed in the 8.9 series under #7681
creator: tim
